entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:19 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:19 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
